short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highly configurable, feature rich eBay app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fast Search for eBay is an advanced, highly configurable eBay web app loaded with features to make searching eBay more enjoyable.

Features include the ability to search eBay international sites, search suggest, follow search configurations, watch listings, view popular listings, eBay deals and a dozen sorting options. Fast Search for eBay is highly configurable and made is made for the active eBay user.

Want to monitor a listing? With a click of the mouse you can stay on top of your favorite listings inside the "Watching" tab. 

Do you often search for the same keyword but with a different search criteria? Following a search configuration allow you to monitor listings in a particular category/ price range or keyword. 

Fast Search for eBay Features

 - Follow Search Configurations
 - Watch Listings
 - Free Shipping Search
 - Choose Default Tab On App Load
 - eBay Deals / eBay Daily Deals
 - View / Search Popular eBay Listings
 - Intelligent Search Suggest
 - Alternative / Relevant Search Suggestion
 - Search Specific Category
 - Search Auctions / Buy It Now
 - Min / Max Price
 - Item Condition 
 - View Listing Images
 - Search Completed listings
 - Search Refresh (Set in app options)
 - eBay Search Alert
 - Ad Free \ No Ad Block Needed

Supported eBay sites

 - United States
 - UK
 - Austria
 - Australia    
 - Belgium (French)
 - Canada (English)
 - Germany
 - France
 - India
 - Ireland
 - Italy
 - Netherlands
 - Spain
 - Switzerland

Frequently Asked Questions 
http://www.fastsearchapps.com/fse/faq.php

Fast Search for eBay Extension https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/fast-search-for-ebay/kjajclaocdighkjplbekkofpmdbcjghf

Fast Search for eBay is great coupon finder for deals on eBay and a smart way to save money, everyday we refresh our pages and give you the best deals. Compare prices on Amazon.com to make sure you're getting the best deal with  Fast Search for eBay.

IMPORTANT: Fast Search for eBay is not associated with eBay, does NOT ask for your eBay login information and you do NOT need to be logged in to eBay.com for this app to work.  Fast Search for eBay works independently of eBay. Fast Search for eBay is spyware/adware free and will not harm your computer/browser in any way. Fast Search for eBay does not track, store or sell any personal information.

The developers of this app appreciate any feedback you may have. If you discover a problem with Fast Search for eBay, let us know right away and we will fix the issue ASAP!
